# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-105">준수 센터의 DLP(데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에 사용할 준비가 된 많은 중요한 정보 유형이 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-106">이 문서에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형을 나열하고 DLP 정책이 각 유형을 검색할 때 검색하는 정보를 보여 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-107">중요한 정보 유형에 대한 자세한 내용은 중요한 정보 [유형을 참조하세요.](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-108">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-109">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-110">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-111">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-112">00-12, 21-32, 61-72 또는 80 범위의 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-113">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-114">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-115">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-116">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-117">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-118">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-119">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-120">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-121">정책은 300자 이내의 접근성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도 중간 정도의 신뢰를 가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-122">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-123">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-124">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-125">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-138">라우팅 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-138">routing no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-139">라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-139">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-140">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-140">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-141">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-141">routing#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-142">RTN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-142">RTN</span></span>


## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-143">아르헨티나 국가 ID(DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-144">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-145">8자리 숫자(또는 기간이 없는 경우)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-146">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-147">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-148">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-149">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-150">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-151">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-152">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-153">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-154">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-155">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-156">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-157">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-158">검색된 Keyword_argentina_national_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-159">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-159">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-160">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-160">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-161">Argentina National Identity number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-161">Argentina National Identity number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-163">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-163">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-164">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-164">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-165">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-165">documento nacional de identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-166">documento número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-166">documento número</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-167">documento numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-167">documento numero</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-169">rnp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-169">rnp</span></span> 
   
## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-170">아르헨티나 고유 세금 식별 키(CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-171">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-172">대시가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-172">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-173">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-174">대시가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-174">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-175">20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 또는 34의 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-176">하이픈(-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-177">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-178">하이픈(-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-179">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-180">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-181">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-182">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-183">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-184">이 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-185">시작 `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-186">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-187">이 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-188">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-188">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_unique_tax_key"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-189">Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-189">Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-190">Clave Unica de Identificacion Tributaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-190">Clave Unica de Identificacion Tributaria</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-191">CUIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-191">CUIT</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-192">고유한 랩 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-192">unique code of labour identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-193">Clave Única de Identificación Tributaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-193">Clave Única de Identificación Tributaria</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-194">고유한 실무 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-194">unique labour identification code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-195">CUIL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-195">CUIL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-196">고유 세금 식별 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-196">Unique Tax Identification Key</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-197">고유 랩 식별 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-197">Unique Labour Identification Key</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-198">랩 식별의 고유 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-198">Unique Key of Labour Identification</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-226">호주 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-227">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-228">은행 주 분기 번호가 있는 경우 또는 없는 6-10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-228">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-229">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-230">계정 번호는 6자리에서 10자리까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-231">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-232">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-233">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-234">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-235">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-236">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-237">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-238">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-239">정규식 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-240">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-241">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-242">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-243">정규식 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-244">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-258">full names</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-258">full names</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-260">오스트레일리아 비즈니스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-260">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-261">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-262">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-263">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-263">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-264">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-264">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-265">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-266">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-267">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-268">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-268">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-269">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-270">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-270">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-271">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-271">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-272">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-272">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-273">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-273">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-274">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-274">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-275">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-275">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-276">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-276">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-277">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-277">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-278">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-279">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-279">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-280">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-281">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-281">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-282">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-282">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-283">검색된 Keywords_australian_business_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-283">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-284">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-285">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-285">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-295">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-295">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-296">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-296">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-297">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-297">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-298">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-298">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-299">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-299">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-300">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-300">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-301">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-301">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-302">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-303">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-303">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-304">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-305">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-305">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-306">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-306">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-307">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-307">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-308">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-308">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-309">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-309">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-310">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-310">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-311">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-312">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-312">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-313">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-314">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-314">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-315">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-315">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-316">검색된 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-316">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-317">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-317">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-318">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-318">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-320">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-320">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-321">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-321">acn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-322">australia company no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-322">australia company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-323">australia company no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-323">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-324">australia company number(오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-324">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-325">australian company no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-325">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-326">australian company no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-326">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-327">australian company number(오스트레일리아 회사 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-327">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-328">호주 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-329">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-330">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-331">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-332">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-333">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-334">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-335">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-336">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-337">선택적 문자 1-2개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-338">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-339">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-340">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-341">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-342">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-343">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-344">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-345">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-346">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-347">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-447">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-448">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-449">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-450">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-451">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-452">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-453">9자리 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-453">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-454">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-455">11번째 숫자(선택 사항)는 개인 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-456">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-457">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-458">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-459">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-460">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-461">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-462">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-467">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-467">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-468">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-468">bank payments</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-474">호주 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-475">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-476">영문자 8자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-478">한 문자(N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) 다음에 7자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by 7 digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-479">2개 문자(PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) 다음에 7자리가 습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-479">2 letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by 7 digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-480">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-481">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-482">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-483">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-484">`Regex_australia_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-485">시작 `Keyword_australia_passport_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-486">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-487">`Regex_australia_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-507">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-508">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-509">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-510">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-511">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백이 있는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-512">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-513">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-514">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-515">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-516">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-517">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-518">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-519">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-520">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-521">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-522">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-523">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-524">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-524">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-525">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-525">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-528">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-528">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-529">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-529">portfolio number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-534">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-534">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-535">오스트리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-536">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-537">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-538">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-539">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-540">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-541">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-542">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-543">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-544">`Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-545">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-670">Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-670">Führerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-671">Führerscheinnummern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-671">Führerscheinnummern</span></span>

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-672">오스트리아 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-673">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-674">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-675">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-676">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-677">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-678">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-679">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-680">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-681">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-682">24자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="2c079-683">22개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-684">두 글자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-685">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-686">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-687">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-688">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-689">`Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-690">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-691">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-693">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-693">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-694">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-694">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-696">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-697">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-698">문자 1개, 선택적 공백 및 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-699">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-700">문자 1자, 숫자 7자 및 공백 1개 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-701">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-702">하나의 공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-703">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-704">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-705">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-706">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-707">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-708">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-709">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-710">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-711">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-712">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-713">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-724">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-724">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-725">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-725">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-726">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-726">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-727">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-727">reisepassnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-728">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-728">reisepasse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-729">No-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-729">No-Reisepass</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-730">Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-730">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-731">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-731">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-735">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-735">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-736">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-736">date of expiry</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-737">오스트리아 사회 보장 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-738">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-739">지정된 형식의 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-740">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-741">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-742">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-743">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-744">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-745">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-746">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-747">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-748">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-749">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-750">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-751">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-752">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-753">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-753">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-754">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-754">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-755">austrian ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-755">austrian ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-756">ehic number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-756">ehic number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-757">ehic no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-757">ehic no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-758">insurance code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-758">insurance code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-759">insurancecode #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-759">insurancecode#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-760">insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-760">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-761">insurance no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-761">insurance no</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-778">오스트리아 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-779">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-780">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-781">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-782">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-783">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-784">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-785">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-786">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-787">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-788">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-789">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-790">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-791">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-792">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-793">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-794">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-795">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-818">오스트리아 부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-819">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-820">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-821">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-822">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-823">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-824">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-825">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-826">11자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-827">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-828">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-829">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-830">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-831">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-832">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-833">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-834">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-835">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-836">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-837">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-838">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-839">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-840">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-841">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-842">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-843">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-844">검색된 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-845">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-846">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-855">austrian vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-855">austrian vat</span></span>
