## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-864">Azure DocumentDB auth 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-865">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-866">문자열 "DocumentDb" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-867">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-868">문자열 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-869">3~200자 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-870">기호(>), 등호(=), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-871">대문자 86자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-872">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-873">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-874">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-876">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-877">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-878">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-879">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-879">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-880">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-880">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-881">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-881">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-882">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-882">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-883">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-883">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-884">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-884">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-885">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-885">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-886">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-886">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-887">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-887">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-888">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-888">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-889">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-889">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-890">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-890">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-891">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-891">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-892">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-892">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-893">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-894">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-895">문자열 "Server", "server", "data source" 다음에 문자열 "cloudapp.azure"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-896">com" 또는 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-897">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-898">net", 문자열 "Password" 또는 "password" 또는 "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-899">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-900">문자열 "Server", "server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-901">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-902">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-903">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-904">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-905">문자열 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-907">net", "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-908">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-908">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-909">1에서 300 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-909">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-910">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-910">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-911">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-912">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-913">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-914">세미콜론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-914">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-915">세미코론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-915">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-916">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-917">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-918">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-919">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-919">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-920">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-920">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-921">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-921">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-922">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-922">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-923">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-923">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-924">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-924">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-925">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-925">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-926">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-926">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-927">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-927">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-928">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-928">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-929">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-929">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-930">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-930">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-931">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-931">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-932">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-932">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-933">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-933">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-934">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-934">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-935">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-935">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-936">Azure IoT 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-936">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-937">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-938">문자열 "HostName" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열(문자열 "azure-devices")입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-938">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-939">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-939">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-940">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-940">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-941">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-941">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-942">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-942">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-943">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-943">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-944">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-944">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-945">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-945">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-946">문자열 "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-946">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-947">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-947">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-948">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-948">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-949">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-949">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-950">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-950">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-951">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-951">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-952">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-952">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-953">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-953">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-954">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-954">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-955">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-956">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-956">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-957">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-958">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-959">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-959">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-960">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-960">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-961">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-961">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-962">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-962">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-963">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-963">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-964">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-964">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-966">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-966">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-967">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-967">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-968">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-968">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-975">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-975">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-976">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-976">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-977">문자열 "userpwd=" 다음에 영문 문자열이 오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-977">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-978">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-978">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-979">문자열 "userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-979">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-980">소문자 60자 또는 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-980">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-981">인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-981">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-982">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-982">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-983">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-983">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-984">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-984">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-985">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-985">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-986">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-986">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-987">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-987">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-988">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-988">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-989">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-989">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-990">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-990">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-991">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-991">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-993">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-993">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-994">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-994">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-995">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-995">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-996">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-996">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-997">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-997">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-998">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-998">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-999">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-999">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1000">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1000">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1001">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1001">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1002">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1002">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1003">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1004">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1004">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1005">net" 다음에 문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1005">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1006">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1006">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1007">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1007">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1008">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1008">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1009">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1009">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1010">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1010">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1011">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1011">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1012">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1012">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1013">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1013">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1014">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1014">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1015">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1015">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1016">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1016">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1017">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1017">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1018">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1018">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1019">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1019">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1020">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1020">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1021">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1021">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1022">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1022">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1023">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1023">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1024">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1024">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1027">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1027">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1028">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1028">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1029">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1029">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1030">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1030">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1031">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1031">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1032">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1032">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1033">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1033">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1034">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1034">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1035">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1035">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1036">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1036">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1037">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1038">문자열 "sig" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1038">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1039">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1039">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1040">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1040">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1041">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1041">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1042">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1042">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1043">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1043">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1044">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%) 중 소문자 또는 대문자인 43-53자 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1044">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1045">문자열 "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1045">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1046">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1046">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1047">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1048">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1049">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1050">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1051">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1051">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1052">Azure 서비스 버스 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1052">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1053">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1054">문자열 "Servicebus.windows"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 이어지며 문자열 "EndPoint"가 그 다음에 오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1054">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1055">net" 및 "SharedAccesKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1055">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1056">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1056">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1057">문자열 "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1057">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1058">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1058">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1059">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1059">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1060">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1061">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1061">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1062">문자열 "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1062">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1063">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1063">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1064">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1064">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1065">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1065">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1066">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1066">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1067">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1067">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1068">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1068">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1069">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1069">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1070">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1070">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1071">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1072">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1072">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1073">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1074">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1074">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1075">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1075">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1076">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1076">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1077">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1077">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1078">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1078">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1081">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1081">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1082">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1082">northwind</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1084">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1084">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1085">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1085">localhost</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1089">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1089">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1090">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1090">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1091">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1091">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1092">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1093">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"에 문자열 "AccountKey"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 이어지며</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1093">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1094">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1094">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1095">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1095">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1096">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1096">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1097">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1097">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1098">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1098">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1099">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1099">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1100">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1100">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1101">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1101">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1102">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1102">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1103">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1103">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1104">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1104">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1105">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1105">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1106">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1107">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1107">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1108">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1109">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1110">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1110">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1111">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1111">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1112">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1112">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1113">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1113">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1115">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1115">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1116">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw==</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1116">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw==</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1117">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1117">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1118">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1118">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1119">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1119">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1120">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1120">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1121">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1121">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1122">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1122">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1123">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1123">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1124">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1124">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1125">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1125">127.0.0.1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1128">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1128">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1129">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1129">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1130">Azure Storage 계정 키(일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1130">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1131">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1132">아래 패턴에 설명된 86개 이하 또는 대문자, 자릿수, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1132">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1133">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1133">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1134">기호(>), 아포스트로피('), 등호(=), 따로 표시(") 또는 숫자 기호(#) 중 하나까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1134">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1135">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1135">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1136">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1136">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1137">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1138">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1139">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1140">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1140">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1141">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1141">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1142">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1142">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1143">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1144">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1144">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1145">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1146">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1146">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1147">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1148">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1148">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1149">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1150">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1150">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1151">`Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1151">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1152">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1152">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1153">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1153">Keywords</span></span>


#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1154">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1154">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1155">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1155">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1156">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1156">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1157">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1157">driverlicense</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1285">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1285">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1286">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1287">11자리 숫자와 선택적분자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1287">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1288">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1289">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1289">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1290">YY 형식의 6자리 숫자와 2개의 선택적 기간 생년월일용 MM.DD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1290">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1291">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 delimiter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1291">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1292">3개의 일직선 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 홀수)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1292">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1293">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 delimiter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1293">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1294">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1294">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1295">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1296">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1297">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1298">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1299">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1299">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1300">검색된 Keyword_belgium_national_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1300">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1301">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1301">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1302">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1302">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1303">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1303">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1304">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1304">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1363">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1363">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1364">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1365">2개의 문자와 공백이나 따로 6자리 숫자(공백 또는 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1365">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1366">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1367">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1367">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1368">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1369">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1369">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1370">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1370">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1371">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1372">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1372">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1373">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1373">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1374">정규식은 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜 또는 에서 키워드를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾을 수 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1374">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1375">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1375">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1376">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1376">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1377">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1377">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1402">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1402">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1403">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1403">date of expiry</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1404">벨기에 부가가치 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1404">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1405">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1406">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1407">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1408">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1409">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1410">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1411">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1412">12자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1412">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1413">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1414">12자 영문 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1414">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1415">문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1415">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1416">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1416">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1417">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1417">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1418">1에서 9까지의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1418">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1419">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1419">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1420">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1420">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1421">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1421">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1422">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1422">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1423">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1424">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1424">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1425">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1426">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1427">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1427">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1428">검색된 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1428">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1429">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1430">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1430">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1431">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1431">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1432">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1432">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1433">nº tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1433">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1434">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1434">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1435">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1435">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1436">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1436">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1437">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1437">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1438">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1438">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1439">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1439">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1440">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1440">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1441">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1441">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1442">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1442">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1443">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1444">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1444">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1445">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1446">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1446">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1447">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1447">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1448">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1448">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1449">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1450">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1450">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1451">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1451">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1452">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1452">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1453">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1453">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1454">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1454">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1455">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1455">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1456">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1457">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1458">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1459">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1460">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1460">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1461">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cpf 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1461">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1462">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1463">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1464">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1464">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1465">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1466">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1466">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1467">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1467">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1468">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1468">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1469">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1469">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1470">Registration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1470">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1471">수익</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1471">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1472">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1472">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1473">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1473">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1474">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1474">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1475">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1475">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1476">Receita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1476">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1477">브라질 법인 번호(CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1477">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1478">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1479">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1479">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1480">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1481">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1481">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1482">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1482">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1483">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1483">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1484">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1484">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1485">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1485">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1486">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1486">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1487">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1487">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1488">4자리 분기 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1488">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1489">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1489">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1490">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1490">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1491">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1492">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1493">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1494">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1494">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1495">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1495">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1496">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1496">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1497">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1498">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1498">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1499">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1499">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1500">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
