## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1522">브라질 국가 ID 카드(RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1522">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1523">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1524">Registro Geral(이전 형식): 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1524">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1525">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식): 11자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1526">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1527">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1527">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1528">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1528">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1529">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1529">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1530">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1530">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1531">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1531">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1532">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1532">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1533">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1533">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1534">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1534">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1535">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1536">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1536">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1537">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1537">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1538">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1538">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1539">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1540">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1541">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1542">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1542">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1543">이 Func_brazil_rg 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1543">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1544">검색된 Keyword_brazil_rg 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1544">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1545">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1545">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1550">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1550">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1551">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1551">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1553">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1553">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1554">RG(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1554">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1555">RIC(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1555">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1556">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1556">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1557">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1558">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1558">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1559">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1560">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1560">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1561">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1562">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1563">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1564">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1565">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1565">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1566">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1693">불가리아 유니폼 내선 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1693">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1694">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1694">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1695">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1695">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1696">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1696">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1697">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1697">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1698">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1698">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1699">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1699">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1700">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1701">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1701">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1702">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1703">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1704">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1704">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1705">생년월일 순서에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1705">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1706">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자: 남성의 10진수와 여성의 홀수 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1706">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1707">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1707">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1708">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1709">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1709">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1710">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1711">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1712">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1712">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1713">시작  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1713">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1714">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1714">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1715">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1715">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1760">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1760">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1761">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1762">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1762">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1763">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1764">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1764">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1765">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1766">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1767">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1768">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1769">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1769">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1770">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1771">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1771">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1772">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1773">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1773">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1774">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1774">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1775">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1775">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1780">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1780">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1783">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1783">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1784">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1784">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1785">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1785">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1786">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1786">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1787">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1787">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1788">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1788">номер на паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1789">номер на паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1789">номер на паспорт</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1792">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1792">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1793">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1793">date of expiry</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1794">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1794">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1795">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1796">7자리 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1796">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1797">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1798">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7자리 또는 12자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1798">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1799">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1799">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1800">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1800">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1801">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1801">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1802">3자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1802">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1803">0 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1803">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1804">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1804">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1805">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1806">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1807">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1808">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1808">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1809">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1809">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1810">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1811">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1811">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1812">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1813">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1813">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1814">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1814">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1838">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1838">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1839">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1840">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1840">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1841">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1842">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1842">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1843">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1844">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1844">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1845">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1846">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1847">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1847">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1848">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1848">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1849">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1849">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1985">캐나다 보건 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1985">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1986">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1986">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1987">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1987">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1988">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1988">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1989">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1989">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1990">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1991">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1991">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-1992">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-1993">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1994">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1994">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-1995">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-1995">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2007">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2007">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2008">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2008">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2009">대문자 2자, 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2009">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2010">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2010">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2011">대문자 2자, 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2011">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2012">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2012">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2013">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2013">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2014">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2015">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2015">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2016">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2016">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2017">또는 Keyword_canada_passport_number Keyword_passport 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2017">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2047">캐나다 PHIN(개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2047">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2048">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2048">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2049">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2049">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2050">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2050">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2051">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2051">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2052">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2053">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2053">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2054">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2055">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2055">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2056">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2056">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2057">두 개 이상의 Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2057">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2090">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2090">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2091">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2092">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2092">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2093">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2094">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2094">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2095">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2095">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2096">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2096">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2097">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2097">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2098">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2098">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2099">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2099">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2100">무형: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2100">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2101">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2102">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2102">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2103">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2104">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2104">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2105">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2105">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2106">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2106">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2107">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2107">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2108">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2108">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2109">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2109">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2110">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2110">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2111">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2111">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2112">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2112">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2113">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2113">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2114">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2114">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2139">칠레 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2139">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2140">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2141">7-8자리 숫자와 검사 숫자 또는 문자를 더한 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2141">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2142">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2143">7-8자리 숫자와 함께하는 데 10자리 숫자를 더한 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2143">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2144">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2144">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2145">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2145">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2146">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2146">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2147">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2147">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2148">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2148">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2149">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2149">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2150">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2150">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2151">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2152">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2153">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2154">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2155">이 Func_chile_id_card 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2155">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2156">검색된 Keyword_chile_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2156">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2157">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2158">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2158">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2159">이 Func_chile_id_card 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2159">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2160">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2184">칠레 ID no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2184">Chilean identity no.</span></span>

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2197">중국 거주자 ID 카드(PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2197">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2198">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2199">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2199">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2200">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2201">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2201">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2202">주소 코드인 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2202">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2203">생년월일인 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2203">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2204">주문 코드인 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2204">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2205">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2205">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2206">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2207">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2207">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2208">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2209">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2209">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2210">이 Func_china_resident_id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2210">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2211">검색된 Keyword_china_resident_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2211">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2212">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2213">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2214">이 Func_china_resident_id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2214">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2215">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2215">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2216">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2216">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2217">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2217">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2218">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2218">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2219">PRC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2219">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2220">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2220">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2221">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2221">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2222">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2222">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2223">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2223">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2224">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2224">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2225">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2225">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2226">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2226">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2227">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2227">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2228">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2228">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2229">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2230">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는(dddddd)될 수 있으며 Luhn 테스트를 통과해야 하는 14-16자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2230">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2231">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2232">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 기프트 카드 및 다이너 카드를 비롯한 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드의 카드를 감지하는 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2232">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2233">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2234">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2234">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2235">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2236">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2237">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2237">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2238">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2239">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2239">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2240">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2240">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2241">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2241">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2242">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2243">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2243">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2244">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2244">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2245">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2245">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2505">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2505">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2506">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2507">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2507">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2508">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2509">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2509">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2510">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2511">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2511">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2512">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2513">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2513">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2514">`Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2514">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2515">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2515">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2639">크로아티아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2639">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2640">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2640">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2641">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2641">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2642">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2643">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2643">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2644">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2644">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2645">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2645">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2646">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2647">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2648">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2649">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2650">이 Func_croatia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2650">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2651">검색된 Keyword_croatia_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2651">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2682">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2682">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2683">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2684">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2684">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2686">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2686">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2687">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2688">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2688">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2689">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2690">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2690">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2691">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2691">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2692">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2692">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2693">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2693">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2694">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2694">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2695">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2695">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2696">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2696">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2714">크로아티아 개인 식별(OIB) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2714">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2715">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2715">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2716">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2716">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2717">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2718">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2718">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2719">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2719">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2720">마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2720">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2721">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2722">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2722">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2723">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2724">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2724">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2725">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2725">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2726">검색된 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2726">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2727">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2727">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2728">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2728">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2729">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2729">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2730">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2730">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2761">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2761">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2762">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2763">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2763">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2764">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2765">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2765">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2766">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2767">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2767">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2768">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2769">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2769">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2770">`Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2770">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2771">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2771">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2772">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2772">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2781">driver lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2781">driver lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2782">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2782">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2783">driver licenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2783">driver licenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2784">driver licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2784">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2896">키프로스 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2896">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2897">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2897">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2898">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2898">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2899">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2899">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2900">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2900">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2901">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2901">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2902">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2902">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2903">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2904">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2904">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2905">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2906">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2906">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2907">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2908">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2908">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2909">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2910">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2911">`Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2911">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2912">시작  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2912">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2913">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2913">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2914">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2914">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2915">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2915">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2916">ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2916">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2917">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2917">kimlik karti</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2921">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2921">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2922">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2923">1개 문자와 공백이나 따로 6-8자리 숫자(공백 또는 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2923">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2924">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2925">1개의 문자와 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2925">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2926">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2926">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2927">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2927">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2928">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2928">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2929">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2929">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2930">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2930">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2931">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2931">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2932">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD/MM/YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2932">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2933">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2934">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2934">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2935">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2935">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
