## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2964">키프로스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2964">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2965">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2965">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2966">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2966">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2967">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2967">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2968">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2968">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2969">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2969">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2970">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2970">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2971">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2972">지정된 패턴의 8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2972">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2973">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2974">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2974">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2975">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2975">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2976">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2976">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2977">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2977">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2978">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2979">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2979">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-2980">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2981">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2981">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2982">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2982">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2983">시작  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2983">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-2984">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2984">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-2985">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-2985">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3002">tic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3002">tic#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3006">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3006">tin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3007">vergi kimlik kodu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3007">vergi kimlik kodu</span></span>

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3013">체코 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3013">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3014">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3015">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3015">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3016">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3017">8개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3017">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3018">'E' 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3018">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3019">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3019">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3020">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3020">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3021">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3021">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3022">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3023">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3023">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3024">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3025">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3026">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3026">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3027">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3027">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3153">체코 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3153">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3154">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3155">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3155">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3156">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3157">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3157">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3158">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3159">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3159">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3160">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3161">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3162">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3162">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3163">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3163">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3164">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3164">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3165">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3165">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3166">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3166">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3167">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3167">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3189">체코 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3189">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3190">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3191">선택적 슬래시(이전 형식)가 있는 9자리 숫자(선택적 슬래시(새 형식)가 있는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3191">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3192">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3193">9자리 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3193">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3194">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3194">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3195">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3195">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3196">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3196">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3197">10자리 숫자(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3197">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3198">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3198">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3199">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3199">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3200">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3200">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3201">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3202">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3203">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3204">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3205">이 Func_czech_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3205">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3206">검색된 Keyword_czech_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3206">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3207">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3207">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3208">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3208">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3209">이 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3209">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3210">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3257">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3257">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3258">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3259">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3259">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3260">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3261">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3261">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3262">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3263">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3263">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3264">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3265">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3265">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3266">`Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3266">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3267">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3267">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3391">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3391">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3392">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3393">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3393">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3394">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3395">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3395">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3396">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3397">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3397">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3398">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3399">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3400">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3400">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3401">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3402">정규식이 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜 또는 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 검색한 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3402">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3403">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3403">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3404">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3404">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3405">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3405">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3425">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3425">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3426">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3427">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3427">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3428">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3429">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3429">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3430">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3430">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3431">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3431">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3432">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3432">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3433">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3434">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3434">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3435">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3436">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3437">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3437">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3438">검색된 Keyword_denmark_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3438">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3439">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3439">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3440">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3440">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3441">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3441">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3442">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3442">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3514">DEA(마약 집행 기구) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3514">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3515">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3516">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3516">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3517">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3518">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3518">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3519">등록자 코드인 abcdefghjklmnprstux와 같은 가능한 문자 집합에서 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3519">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3520">한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )는 등록 기관의 성 또는 숫자 '9'의 첫 번째 문자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3520">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3521">7자리 숫자( 마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3521">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3522">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3523">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3523">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3524">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3525">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3525">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3526">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3526">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3527">키워드를 `Keyword_dea_number` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3527">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3528">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3528">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3529">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3529">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3530">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3530">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3531">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3531">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3532">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3532">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3534">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3534">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3535">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3535">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3536">마약 집행 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3536">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3537">마약 집행 기관</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3537">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3538">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3538">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3539">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3540">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3540">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3541">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3542">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3542">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3543">문자 "ET"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3543">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3544">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3544">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3545">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3546">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3546">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3547">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3548">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3548">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3549">`Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3549">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3550">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3550">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3676">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3676">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3677">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3678">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3679">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3680">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3681">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3682">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3683">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3684">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3684">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3686">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3687">성 및 생년월일(홀수 남성, 1-2세대, 19세, 3-4: 20 세기, 5-6: 21 세기)에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3687">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3688">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3688">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3689">같은 날짜에 태어나는 사람을 구분하는 일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3689">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3690">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3690">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3691">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3692">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3693">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3694">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3695">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3695">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3696">시작  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3696">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3697">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3698">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3698">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3731">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3731">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3732">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3733">공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자를 입력하고 공백이나 따로 문자를 1개씩 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3733">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3734">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3735">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3735">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3736">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3737">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3737">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3738">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3739">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3739">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3740">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3740">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3741">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3741">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3742">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3742">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3743">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3743">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3744">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3744">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3745">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3745">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3763">유럽 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3763">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3764">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3765">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3765">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3766">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3767">복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3767">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3768">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3769">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3769">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-3770">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-3771">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3771">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3772">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3772">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3773">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3773">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3774">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3774">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3775">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3775">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3776">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3776">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3777">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3777">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3778">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3778">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-3779">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-3779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4226">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4226">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4227">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4228">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4228">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4229">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4230">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4230">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4231">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4231">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4232">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4232">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4233">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4234">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4234">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4235">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4236">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4236">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4237">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4238">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4238">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4239">`Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4239">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4240">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4240">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4371">핀란드 유럽 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4371">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4372">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4372">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4373">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4373">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4374">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4374">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4375">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4375">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4376">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4376">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4377">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4377">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4378">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4379">20자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4379">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4380">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4381">20자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4381">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4382">10자리 숫자 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4382">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4383">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4383">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4384">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4384">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4385">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4386">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4386">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4387">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4388">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4388">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4389">regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4389">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4390">검색된 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4390">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4404">sjukförsäkring nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4404">sjukförsäkring nummer</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4408">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4408">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4409">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4410">6자리 숫자와 세 번째 숫자와 검사 숫자를 나타내는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4410">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4411">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4412">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4412">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4413">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4413">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4414">century 마커('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4414">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4415">3자리 개인식별번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4415">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4416">검사 숫자인 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 미지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4416">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4417">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4418">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4418">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4419">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4420">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4420">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4421">함수가 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4421">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4422">검색된 Keyword_finnish_national_id 발견</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4422">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4423">체크 체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4423">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4424">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4424">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4425">함수가 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4425">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4426">체크 체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4426">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4475">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4475">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4476">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4476">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4477">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4477">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4478">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4478">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4479">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4479">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4480">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4480">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4481">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4481">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4482">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4482">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4483">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4484">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4484">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4485">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4486">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4486">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4487">`Regex_finland_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4487">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4488">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4488">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4489">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4489">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4490">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4491">`Regex_finland_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4491">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4492">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4492">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4516">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4516">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4517">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4517">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4518">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4519">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4519">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4520">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4521">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4521">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4522">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4523">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4523">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4524">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4525">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4526">함수가 Func_french_drivers_license 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4526">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4527">검색된 Keyword_french_drivers_license 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4527">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4654">프랑스 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4654">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4655">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4655">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4656">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4656">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4657">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4657">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4658">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4658">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4659">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4659">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4660">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4660">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4661">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4662">21자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4662">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4664">21자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4664">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4665">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4665">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4666">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4666">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4667">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4667">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4668">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4669">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4669">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4670">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4671">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4671">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4672">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4673">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4673">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4674">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4674">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4675">검색된 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4675">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4676">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4676">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4677">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4677">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4678">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4678">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4679">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4679">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4680">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4680">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4681">프랑스 국가 ID 카드(CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4681">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4682">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4683">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4683">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4684">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4685">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4685">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4686">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4686">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4687">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4687">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4688">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4688">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4689">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4689">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4690">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4690">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4691">검색된 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4691">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4692">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4692">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4696">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4696">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4697">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4697">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4698">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4698">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4699">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4699">compte bancaire</span></span>
