- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4703">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4703">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4704">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4704">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4705">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4705">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4706">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4706">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4707">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4707">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4708">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4709">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4709">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4710">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4711">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4711">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4712">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4712">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4713">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4713">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4714">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4714">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4715">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4716">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4717">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4718">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4719">이 `Func_fr_passport` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4719">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4720">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4720">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4721">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4721">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4722">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4723">이 `Func_fr_passport` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4723">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4724">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4724">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4755">프랑스 사회 보장 번호(INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4755">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4756">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4757">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4757">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4758">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4759">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4759">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4760">13자리 숫자, 공백, 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4760">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4761">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4761">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4762">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4762">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4763">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4764">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4764">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4765">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4766">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4766">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4767">이 `Func_french_insee` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4767">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4768">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4768">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4769">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4769">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4770">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4770">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4771">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4771">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4772">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4773">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4773">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4774">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4774">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4775">code sécu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4775">code sécu</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4778">fssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4778">fssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4779">le numéro d'identification nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4779">le numéro d'identification nationale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4780">le code de la sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4780">le code de la sécurité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4781">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4781">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4782">national identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4782">national identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4783">no d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4783">no d'identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-p133">
no. d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-p133">no. d'identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4786">numéro d'assurance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4786">numéro d'assurance</span></span>

no. d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-p134">no. d'identite</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4803">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4803">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4804">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4805">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4805">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4806">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4807">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4807">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4808">0, 1, 2 또는 3이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4808">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4809">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4809">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4810">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4810">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4811">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4811">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4812">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4812">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4813">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4813">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4814">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4814">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4815">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4815">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4816">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4816">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4817">검사 숫자 3개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4817">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4818">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4818">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4819">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4819">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4820">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4820">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4821">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4821">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4822">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4822">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4823">시작  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4823">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4824">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4824">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4825">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4825">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4826">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4826">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4828">numéro d'identification 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4828">numéro d'identification fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4829">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4829">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4830">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4830">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4831">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4831">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4832">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4832">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4833">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4833">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4834">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4834">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4835">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4835">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4836">에 대한 나타 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4836">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4837">일자 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4837">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4838">일자 수 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4838">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4839">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4839">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4840">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4840">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4841">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4841">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4842">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4842">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4843">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4843">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4844">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4844">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4845">프랑스 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4845">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4846">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4846">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4847">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4847">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4848">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4848">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4849">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4849">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4850">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4850">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4851">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4851">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4852">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4853">영문자 13자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4853">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4854">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4855">영문자 13자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4855">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4856">두 글자 - FR(대소문자 미지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4856">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4857">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4857">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4858">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4858">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4859">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4859">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4860">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4860">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4861">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4861">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4862">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4862">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4863">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4863">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4864">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4864">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4865">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4866">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4867">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4868">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4868">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4869">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4869">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4870">검색된 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4870">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4871">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4871">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4872">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4872">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4873">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4873">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4874">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4874">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4875">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4875">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4876">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4876">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4877">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4877">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4878">부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4878">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4879">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4879">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4880">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4880">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4881">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4881">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4882">n° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4882">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4883">numéro de tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4883">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4884">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4884">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4885">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4885">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4886">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4886">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4887">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4887">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4888">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4889">11자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4889">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4890">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4891">11자리 숫자 및 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 됨):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4891">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4892">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4892">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4893">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4893">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4894">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4894">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4895">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4895">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4896">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4896">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4897">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4898">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4898">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-4899">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-4900">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4901">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4901">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4902">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4902">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-4903">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-4903">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5052">독일 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5052">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5053">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5054">2010년 11월 1일: 9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5054">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5055">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지: 10자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5055">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5056">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5057">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5057">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5058">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5058">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5059">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5059">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5060">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5060">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5061">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5061">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5062">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5063">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5064">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5065">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5065">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5066">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5066">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5067">검색된 Keyword_germany_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5067">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5068">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5068">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5069">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5069">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5070">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5070">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5071">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5071">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5072">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5072">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5073">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5073">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5074">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5074">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5075">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5075">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5076">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5076">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5077">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5077">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5078">personal id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5078">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5079">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5079">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5080">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5080">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5081">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5081">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5082">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5082">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5083">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5083">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5084">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5084">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5085">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5086">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5086">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5087">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5088">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5088">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5089">첫 문자는 이 집합의 숫자 또는 문자(C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5089">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5090">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5090">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5091">이 집합의 5자리 숫자 또는 문자(C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5091">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5092">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5092">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5093">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5093">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5094">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5094">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5095">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5095">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5096">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5096">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5097">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5097">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5098">키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5098">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5099">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5099">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5100">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5100">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5101">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5101">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5102">키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5102">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5103">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5103">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5126">독일 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5126">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5127">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5128">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5128">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5129">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5130">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5130">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5131">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5131">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5132">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5132">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5133">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5133">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5134">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5134">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5135">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5135">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5136">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5136">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5137">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5137">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5138">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5138">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5139">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5140">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5140">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5141">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5142">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5142">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5143">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5143">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5144">시작  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5144">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5145">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5145">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5146">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5146">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5172">독일 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5172">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5173">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5173">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5174">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5174">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5175">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5175">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5176">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5176">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5177">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5177">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5178">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5178">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5179">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5180">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5180">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5181">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5182">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5182">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5183">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5183">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5184">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5184">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5185">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5185">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5186">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5186">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5187">선택적 공백 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5187">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5188">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5188">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5189">선택적 공백 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5189">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5190">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5191">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5192">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5192">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5193">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5194">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5194">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5195">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5195">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5196">검색된 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5196">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5197">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5197">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5198">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5198">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5199">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5199">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5200">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5200">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5201">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5201">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5202">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5202">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5203">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5203">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5204">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5204">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5205">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5205">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5206">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5206">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5207">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5207">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5208">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5208">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5209">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5209">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5210">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5211">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5211">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5212">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5213">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5213">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5214">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5215">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5215">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5217">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5217">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5218">`Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5218">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5219">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5219">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5220">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5220">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5221">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5221">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5222">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5222">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5223">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5223">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5224">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5224">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5225">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5225">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5226">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5226">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5227">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5227">driverlicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5228">driver lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5228">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5229">driver lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5229">driver lics</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5344">Δίπλωμα οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5344">Δίπλωμα οδήγησης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5345">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5345">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5346">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5347">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5347">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5348">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5348">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5349">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5349">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5350">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5350">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5351">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5351">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5352">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5352">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5353">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5353">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5354">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5354">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5355">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5355">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5356">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5356">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5357">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5358">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5358">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5359">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5360">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5360">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5361">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5361">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5362">검색된 Keyword_greece_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5362">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5363">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5363">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5364">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5364">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5365">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5365">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5366">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5366">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5367">그리스어 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5367">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5368">그리스어 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5368">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5369">그리스어 개인 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5369">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5370">그리스어 경찰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5370">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5371">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5371">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5372">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5372">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5373">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5373">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5374">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5374">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5375">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5375">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5376">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5377">문자 2개와 공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자(공백이나 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5377">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5378">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5379">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5379">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5380">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5381">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5381">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5382">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5383">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5384">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5384">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5385">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5386">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM YY(예 - 28 8월 19일) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5386">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5387">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5388">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5388">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5389">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5390">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5390">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5391">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5391">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5392">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5392">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5393">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5393">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5394">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5394">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5395">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5395">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5396">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5396">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5397">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5397">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5398">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5398">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5399">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5399">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5400">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5400">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5401">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5401">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5402">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5402">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5403">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5403">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5404">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5404">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5405">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5405">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5406">그리스 AMKA(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5406">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5407">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5407">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5408">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5408">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5409">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5409">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5410">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5410">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5411">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5411">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5412">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5412">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5413">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5414">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5414">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5415">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5415">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5416">YYMMDD 생년월일로 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5416">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5417">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5417">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5418">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5418">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5419">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5420">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5420">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5421">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5422">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5423">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5423">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5424">시작  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5424">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5425">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5425">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5426">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5426">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5427">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5427">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5428">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5428">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5429">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5429">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5430">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5430">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5431">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5431">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5432">socialsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5432">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5433">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5433">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5434">amka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5434">amka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5435">a.m.k.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5435">a.m.k.a.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5436">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5436">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5437">그리스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5437">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5438">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5438">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5439">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5439">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5440">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5440">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5441">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5441">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5442">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5442">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5443">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5443">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5444">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5445">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5445">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5446">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5447">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5447">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5448">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5448">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5449">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5449">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5450">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5450">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5451">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5451">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5452">`Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5452">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5453">시작  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5453">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5482">HKID(홍콩 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5482">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5483">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5484">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5484">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5485">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5486">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5486">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5487">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5487">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5488">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5488">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5489">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5489">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5490">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5490">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5491">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5491">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5492">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5492">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5493">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5493">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5494">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5494">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5495">검색된 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5495">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5496">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5496">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5497">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5497">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5498">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5498">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5499">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5499">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
