## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5539">헝가리 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5539">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5540">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5541">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5541">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5542">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5543">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5543">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5544">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5544">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5545">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5545">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5546">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5547">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5547">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5548">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5549">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5549">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5550">`Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5550">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5551">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5551">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5679">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5680">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5681">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5682">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5683">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5684">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5684">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5686">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5687">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1900년 이전의 시민 또는 시민권이 2배인 시민의 경우 1-남성, 2-여성, 기타 숫자도 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5687">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5688">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5688">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5689">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5689">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5690">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5690">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5691">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5692">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5693">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5694">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5695">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5695">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5696">시작  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5696">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5697">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5698">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5698">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5699">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5699">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5700">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5700">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5701">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5701">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5702">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5702">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5703">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5703">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5704">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5704">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5705">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5705">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5706">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5706">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5707">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5707">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5708">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5708">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5709">헝가리 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5709">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5710">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5711">2개의 문자와 공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자(공백이나 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5711">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5712">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5712">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5713">2개의 문자와 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5713">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5714">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5714">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5715">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5715">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5716">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5716">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5717">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5717">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5718">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5718">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5719">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5719">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5720">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5720">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5721">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5722">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5722">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5723">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5723">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5734">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5734">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5735">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5735">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5736">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5736">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5737">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5737">útlevél száma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5738">Útlevelek száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5738">Útlevelek száma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5739">útlevél szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5739">útlevél szám</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5740">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5740">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5741">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5741">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5742">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5742">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5743">헝가리 TAJ(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5743">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5744">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5745">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5745">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5746">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5747">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5747">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5748">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5749">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5749">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5750">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5751">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5752">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5752">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5753">시작  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5753">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5754">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5754">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5755">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5755">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5756">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5756">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5757">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5757">Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5758">헝가리어 사회 보장 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5758">hungarian social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5759">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5759">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5760">socialsecuritynumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5760">socialsecuritynumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5761">hssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5761">hssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5762">socialsecuritynno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5762">socialsecuritynno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5763">hssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5763">hssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5764">taj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5764">taj</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5765">taj #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5765">taj#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5766">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5766">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5767">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5767">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5768">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5768">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5769">áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5769">áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5770">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5770">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5771">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5771">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5772">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5772">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5773">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5773">áfa szám</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5775">헝가리 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5775">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5776">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5776">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5777">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5777">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5778">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5778">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5779">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5779">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5780">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5780">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5781">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5781">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5782">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5783">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5783">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5784">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5785">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5785">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5786">"8"이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5786">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5787">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5787">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5788">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5788">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5789">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5790">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5790">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5791">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5792">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5792">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5793">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5793">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5794">시작  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5794">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5795">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5795">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5796">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5796">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5812">에 대한 나타 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5812">taxid#</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5822">헝가리 부가가치 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5822">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5823">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5824">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5825">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5826">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5827">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5828">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5829">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5830">영문자 10자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5830">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5831">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5832">영문자 10자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5832">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5833">두 글자 - HU 또는 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5833">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5834">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5834">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5835">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5835">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5836">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5837">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5838">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5839">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5839">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5840">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5840">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5841">검색된 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5841">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5842">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5842">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5843">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5843">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5844">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5844">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5845">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5845">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5846">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5846">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5847">부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5847">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5848">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5848">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5849">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5849">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5850">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5850">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5851">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5851">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5852">value added tax áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5852">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5853">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5853">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5854">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5854">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5855">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5855">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5856">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5856">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5857">인도 PAN(영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5857">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5858">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5859">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5859">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5860">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5861">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5861">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5862">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5862">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5863">C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G의 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5863">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5864">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5864">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5865">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5865">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5866">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5866">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5867">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5868">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5868">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5869">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5870">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5870">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5871">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5871">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5872">검색된 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5872">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5873">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5873">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5874">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5874">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5875">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5875">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5876">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5876">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5877">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5877">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5878">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5878">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5879">인도 고유 ID(Aadhaar) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5879">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5880">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5881">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5881">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5882">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5883">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5883">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5884">0 또는 1이 아닌 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5884">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5885">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5885">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5886">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5886">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5887">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5887">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5888">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5888">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5889">검사 숫자인 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5889">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5890">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5891">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5892">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5893">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5893">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5894">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5894">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5895">검색된 Keyword_india_aadhar 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5895">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5896">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5896">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5897">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5897">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5898">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5898">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5899">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5899">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5900">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5900">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5901">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5901">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5902">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5902">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5903">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5903">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5904">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5904">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5905">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5905">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5906">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5906">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5907">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5907">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5908">인도네시아 ID 카드(KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5908">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5909">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5910">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5910">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5911">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5912">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5912">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5913">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5913">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5914">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5914">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5915">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5915">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5916">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5916">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5917">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5917">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5918">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5918">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5919">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5919">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5920">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5920">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5921">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5922">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5922">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5923">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5924">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5924">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5925">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5925">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5926">검색된 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5926">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5927">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5927">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5928">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5928">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5929">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5929">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5930">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5930">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5931">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5931">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5932">IBAN(국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5932">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5933">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5933">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5934">국가 코드(2문자) 및 검사 숫자(2자리) 및 bban 번호(최대 30자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5934">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5935">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5935">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5936">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5936">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5937">2문자 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5937">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5938">검사 숫자 2개(선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5938">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5939">4개의 문자 또는 숫자로 1-7개 그룹(공백으로 구분할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5939">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5940">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5940">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5941">각 국가에 대한 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5941">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5942">IBAN 중요한 정보 유형은 다음 60개 국가에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5942">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk , sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5944">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5945">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5945">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5947">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5948">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5948">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5949">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5949">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5950">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5950">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5951">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5951">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5952">국제질병 분류(ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5952">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5953">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5954">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5954">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5955">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5956">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5956">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5957">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5958">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5959">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5960">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5960">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5961">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5961">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5962">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5962">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5963">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5963">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5964">업데이트된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5964">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5965">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5965">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5966">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_updated 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5966">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5967">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5967">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5968">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_codes 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)를](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5968">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5969">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5969">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5970">국제적인 병 분류(ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5970">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5971">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5972">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5972">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5973">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5974">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5974">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5975">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5976">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5976">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5977">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5978">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5979">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5979">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5980">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5980">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5981">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5982">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5982">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5983">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5983">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5984">[ICD-9-CM(International Classification of Diseases,N9th Revision, ICD-9-CM)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5984">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5985">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5985">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5986">ICD-Dictionary_icd_9_codes 국제질병 [분류, 9번째 수정, ICD-9-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5986">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5987">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5987">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5988">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5988">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5989">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5989">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5990">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5990">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5991">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는(기간) 및 서식 없는 버전(기간 없음)을 계정으로 표시하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5991">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5992">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5992">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5993">서식이 있는 IPv6 번호(콜론 포함)를 계정을 표시하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5993">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5994">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5994">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5995">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5996">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5996">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-5997">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-5998">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5998">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-5999">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-5999">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6000">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6000">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6001">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6001">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6002">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6002">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6003">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6003">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6004">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6004">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6005">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6005">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6006">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6006">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6007">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6007">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6008">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6008">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6009">IP(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6009">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6010">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6010">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6011">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6011">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6012">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6012">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6013">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6013">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6014">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6014">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6015">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6016">6자리 숫자와 문자 4자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6016">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6017">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6018">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6018">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6019">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6019">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6020">4개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6020">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6021">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6022">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6023">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6024">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6024">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6025">`Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6025">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6026">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6027">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6027">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6035">driver lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6035">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6036">driver lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6036">driver lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6037">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6037">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6038">driver licenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6038">driver licenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6039">driver licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6039">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6040">driver licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6040">driver licences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6041">driverslic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6041">driverslic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6042">driverslics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6042">driverslics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6043">driverslicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6043">driverslicence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6148">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6148">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6149">ceadúnais tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6149">ceadúnais tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6150">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6150">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6151">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6152">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6152">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6153">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6154">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6154">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6155">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6155">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6156">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6156">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6157">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6157">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6158">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6158">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6159">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6159">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6160">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6160">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6161">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6161">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6162">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6162">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6163">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY(예제 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6163">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6164">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6165">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6165">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6166">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6166">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6190">아일랜드 PPS(개인 공용 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6190">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6191">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6192">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6192">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6193">7자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6193">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6194">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6194">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6195">7자리 숫자와 문자 2자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6195">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6196">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6197">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6197">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6198">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6198">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6199">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6199">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6200">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6200">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6201">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6201">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6202">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6202">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6203">A-I 범위의 선택적 문자 또는 "W"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6203">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6204">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6205">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6205">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6206">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6207">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6208">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6208">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6209">검색된 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6209">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6210">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6211">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6211">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6212">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6212">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6213">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6213">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
