## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6258">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6258">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6259">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6260">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6260">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6261">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6262">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6262">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6263">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6263">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6264">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6264">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6265">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6265">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6266">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6266">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6267">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6267">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6268">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6268">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6269">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6269">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6270">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6271">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6271">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6272">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6273">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6273">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6274">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6274">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6275">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6275">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6276">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6276">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6277">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6277">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6278">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6278">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6279">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6279">Bank Account</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6282">이스라엘 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6282">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6283">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6284">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6284">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6285">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6286">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6286">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6287">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6288">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6288">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6289">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6290">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6290">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6291">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6291">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6292">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6292">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6293">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6293">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6312">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6312">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6313">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6313">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6314">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6314">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6315">10자리 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6315">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6316">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6316">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6317">10자리 문자와 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6317">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6318">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6318">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6319">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6319">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6320">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6321">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6321">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6322">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6323">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6323">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6324">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6325">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6326">`Regex_italy_drivers_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6326">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6327">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6327">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6454">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6454">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6455">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6455">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6456">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6456">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6457">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6457">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6458">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6458">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6459">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6459">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6460">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6460">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6461">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6462">지정된 패턴의 문자 및 숫자 조합 16자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6462">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6463">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6464">문자와 숫자의 16자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6464">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6465">가족 이름의 처음 세 자석에 해당하는 3개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6465">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6466">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자석에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6466">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6467">생년월일의 마지막 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6467">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6468">생년월일 문자에 해당하는 한 문자- 문자는 사전순으로 사용되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에서 T까지의 문자만 사용됩니다(따라서 1월은 A, 10월은 R임).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6468">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6469">성별을 차별화하기 위해 생년월일에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자는 여성의 생년월일에 40이 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6469">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6470">사람이 태어나는 지역 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자(국가 전체 코드가 외국 국가에 사용)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6470">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6471">패리티 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6471">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6472">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6473">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6473">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6474">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6475">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6475">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6476">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6476">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6477">시작  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6477">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6478">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6478">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6479">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6479">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6514">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6514">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6515">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6516">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자와 문자 2자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6516">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6517">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6518">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6518">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6519">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6519">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6520">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6520">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6521">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6521">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6522">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6522">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6523">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6523">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6524">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6524">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6525">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6525">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6526">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6526">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6527">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY(예제 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6527">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6528">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6528">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6529">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6529">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6530">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6530">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6543">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6543">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6554">이탈리아 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6554">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6555">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6555">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6556">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6556">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6557">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6557">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6558">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6558">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6559">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6559">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6560">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6560">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6561">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6562">선택적 소수점 문자가 있는 13자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6562">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6563">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6564">선택적 delimiters가 있는 13자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6564">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6565">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6565">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6566">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6566">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6567">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6567">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6568">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6568">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6569">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6570">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6570">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6571">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6572">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6572">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6573">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6573">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6574">검색된 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6574">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6575">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6575">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6576">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6576">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6577">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6577">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6578">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6578">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6581">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6581">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6582">iva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6582">iva</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6584">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6584">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6585">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6586">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6586">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6587">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6588">bank account number:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6588">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6589">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6589">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6590">bank account branch code:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6590">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6591">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6591">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6592">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6592">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6593">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6593">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6594">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6595">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6595">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6596">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6597">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6597">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6598">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6598">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6599">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6599">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6600">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6600">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6601">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6601">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6602">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6602">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6603">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6603">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6604">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6604">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6605">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6605">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6652">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6652">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6653">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6654">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6654">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6655">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6656">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6656">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6657">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6658">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6659">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6660">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6660">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6661">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6661">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6662">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6662">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6700">일본 내 번호 - 회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6700">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6701">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6701">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6702">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6702">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6703">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6703">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6704">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6704">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6705">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6705">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6706">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6706">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6707">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6707">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6708">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6708">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6709">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6709">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6710">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6710">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6711">1자리에서 9자리까지의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6711">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6712">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6712">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6713">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6714">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6715">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6716">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6716">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6717">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6717">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6718">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6718">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6719">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6719">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6720">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6720">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6721">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6721">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6722">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6722">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6723">회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6723">corporate number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6725">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6725">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6726">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6726">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6727">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6727">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6728">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6728">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6729">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6729">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6730">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6730">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6731">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6731">法人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6732">指定通知書</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6732">指定通知書</span></span>


## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6733">일본 내 번호 - 개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6733">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6734">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6734">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6735">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6735">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6736">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6736">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6737">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6737">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6738">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6738">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6739">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6739">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6740">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6740">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6741">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6741">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6742">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6742">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6743">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6743">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6744">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6744">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6745">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6745">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6746">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6746">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6747">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6747">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6748">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6748">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6749">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6749">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6750">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6750">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6751">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6751">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6752">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6752">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6753">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6753">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6754">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6754">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6755">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6755">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6756">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6756">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6758">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6758">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6761">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6761">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6762">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6762">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6763">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6763">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6764">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6764">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6765">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6765">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6766">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6766">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6767">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6767">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6768">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6768">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6769">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6769">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6770">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6771">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6771">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6772">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6773">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6773">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6774">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6775">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6775">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6776">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6777">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6777">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6778">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6778">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6779">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6779">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6780">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6780">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6781">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6781">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6782">Passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6782">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6783">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6783">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6784">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6784">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6785">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6785">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6786">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6786">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6787">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6787">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6788">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6788">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6789">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6789">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6790">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6790">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6791">ストトトNo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6791">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6792">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6792">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6793">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6793">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6794">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6794">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6795">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6795">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6796">일본 거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6796">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6797">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6798">문자 및 숫자 12개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6798">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6799">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6800">12개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6800">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6801">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6801">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6802">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6802">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6803">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6803">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6804">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6805">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6806">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6807">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6808">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6808">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6809">검색된 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6810">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6810">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6811">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6811">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6812">거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6812">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6813">거주 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6813">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6814">거주 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6814">Residence card #</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6818">일본 거주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6818">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6819">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6820">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6820">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6821">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6822">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6822">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6823">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6824">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6824">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6825">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6826">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6826">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6827">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6827">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6828">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6828">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6829">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6829">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6833">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6833">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6834">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6834">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6835">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6835">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6836">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6836">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6837">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6837">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6838">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6838">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6839">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6839">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6840">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6840">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6841">일본 SIN(사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6841">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6842">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6843">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6843">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6844">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6845">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6845">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6846">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6846">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6847">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6847">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6848">6자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6848">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6849">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6849">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6850">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6851">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6851">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6852">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6853">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6853">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6854">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6854">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6855">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6855">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6856">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6857">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6857">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6858">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6858">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6871">会保険No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6871">社会保険No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6875">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6875">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6876">雇用保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6876">雇用保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6879">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6879">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6880">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6881">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6881">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6882">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6883">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6883">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6884">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6884">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6885">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6885">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6886">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6886">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6887">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6887">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-6888">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6888">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-6889">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6889">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6890">`Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6890">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6891">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6891">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-6915">drivers licenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-6915">drivers licenses</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7015">vadītāja apliecība</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7015">vadītāja apliecība</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7016">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7016">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7017">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7018">11자리 숫자 및 하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7018">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7019">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7020">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7020">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7021">11자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7021">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7022">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7022">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7023">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7023">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7024">생년월일(19번째 19번째 10년의 경우 "1", 21세기의 경우 "2")에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7024">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7025">4자리 숫자( 임의로 생성)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7025">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7026">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7026">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7027">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7027">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7028">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7028">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7029">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7029">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7030">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7030">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7031">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7031">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7032">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7032">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7033">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7033">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7034">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7034">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7035">시작  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7035">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7036">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7037">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7037">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7100">라트비아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7100">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7101">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7102">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자와 문자 2자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7102">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7103">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7104">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7104">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7105">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7105">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7106">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7106">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7107">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7108">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7108">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7109">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7110">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7111">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7111">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7112">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7113">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7113">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7114">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7115">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7115">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7116">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7116">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7139">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7139">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7140">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7141">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7141">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7142">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7143">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7143">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7144">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7144">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7145">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7145">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7146">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7146">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7147">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7147">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7148">`Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7148">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7149">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7149">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7278">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7278">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7279">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7279">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7280">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7280">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7281">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7282">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7282">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7283">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7284">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7284">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7285">생년월일과 성별 및 세기에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1-6)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7285">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7286">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7286">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7287">생년월일 일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7287">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7288">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7288">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7289">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7290">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7290">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7291">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7292">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7292">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7293">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7293">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7294">시작  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7294">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7295">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7295">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7296">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7296">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
