## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7331">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7331">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7332">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7333">공백이나 공백이 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7333">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7334">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7335">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7335">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7336">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7337">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7337">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7338">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7339">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7339">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7340">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7340">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7341">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7341">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7342">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7342">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7343">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7343">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7344">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7344">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7345">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7345">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7346">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7346">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7357">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7357">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7358">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7358">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7359">paso numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7359">paso numeris</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7362">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7362">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7363">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7363">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7364">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7364">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7365">룩세르버그 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7365">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7366">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7367">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7367">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7368">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7369">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7369">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7370">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7371">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7371">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7372">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7373">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7373">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7374">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7374">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7375">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7375">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7499">룩룩부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7499">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7500">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7500">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7501">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7501">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7502">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7502">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7503">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7503">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7504">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7504">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7505">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7505">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7506">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7507">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7507">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7508">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7509">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7509">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7510">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7510">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7511">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7511">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7512">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7513">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7513">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7514">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7515">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7515">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7516">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7516">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7517">시작  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7517">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7518">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7518">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7519">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7519">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7542">룩세르버그 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7542">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7543">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7544">공백이나 공백이 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7544">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7545">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7546">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7546">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7547">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7548">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7548">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7549">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7550">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7550">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7551">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7551">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7552">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7552">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7553">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7553">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7554">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7554">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7555">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7555">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7556">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7556">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7557">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7557">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7588">룩룩부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인이 아닌 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7588">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7589">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7589">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7590">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7590">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7591">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7591">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7592">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7592">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7593">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7594">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7594">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7595">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7595">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7596">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7596">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7597">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7597">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7598">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7598">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7599">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7599">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7600">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7600">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7601">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7602">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7602">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7603">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7604">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7604">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7605">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7605">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7606">시작  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7606">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7607">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7607">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7608">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7608">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7648">말레이시아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7648">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7649">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7649">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7650">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7650">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7651">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7651">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7652">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7652">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7653">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7653">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7654">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7654">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7655">2문자 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7655">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7656">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7656">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7657">3개의 임의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7657">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7658">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7658">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7659">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7660">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7661">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7662">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7662">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7663">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7663">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7664">검색된 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7664">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7691">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7691">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7692">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7693">지정된 패턴의 2자 및 6자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7693">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7694">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7695">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7695">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7696">2자(숫자 또는 문자, 대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7696">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7697">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7697">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7698">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7698">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7699">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7699">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7700">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7700">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7701">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7702">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7702">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7703">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7704">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7705">`Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7706">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7830">몰타 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7830">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7831">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7831">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7832">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7832">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7833">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7833">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7834">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7834">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7835">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7835">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7836">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7836">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7837">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7838">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7838">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7839">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7840">7자리 숫자와 한 글자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7840">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7841">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7841">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7842">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"(대소문자 미정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7842">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7843">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7844">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7844">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7845">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7846">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7847">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7847">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7848">시작  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7848">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7849">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7849">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7850">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7850">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7852">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7852">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7860">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7860">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7862">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7862">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7864">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7864">unique identification number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7867">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7867">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7868">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7869">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7869">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7870">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7871">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7871">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7872">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7873">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7873">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7874">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7875">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7876">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7876">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7877">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7877">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7878">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7878">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7879">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7880">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7880">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7881">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7881">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7892">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7892">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7893">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7893">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7894">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7894">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7895">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7895">numru tal-passaport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7896">numri tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7896">numri tal-passaport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7899">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7899">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7900">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7900">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7901">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7901">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7902">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7903">몰타어 국가:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7903">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7904">지정된 패턴의 7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7904">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7905">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7905">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7906">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7906">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7907">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7908">몰타 국가: 7자리 숫자 및 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7908">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7909">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7909">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7910">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7910">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7911">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7911">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7912">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7912">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7913">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7914">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7914">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7915">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7916">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7916">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7917">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7917">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7918">시작  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7918">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7919">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7919">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7920">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7920">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7921">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7921">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7922">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7922">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7923">citizen service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7923">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7924">id tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7924">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7925">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7925">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7926">kodiċi 개인 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7926">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7927">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7927">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7928">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7928">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7929">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7929">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7930">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7930">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7953">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier(MBI) 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7953">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7954">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7954">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7955">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7955">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7956">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7956">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7957">1에서 9 사이의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7957">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7958">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7958">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7959">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7959">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7960">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7960">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7961">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7961">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7962">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7962">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7963">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7963">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7964">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7964">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7965">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7965">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7966">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7966">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7967">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7967">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7968">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7969">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7969">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7970">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7971">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7971">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7972">`Regex_mbi_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7972">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7973">시작  `Keyword_mbi_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7973">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7974">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7974">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7975">`Regex_mbi_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7975">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7976">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7976">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7977">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7977">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7978">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7978">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7979">mbi #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7979">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7980">medicare beneficiary #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7980">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7981">medicare 수급자 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7981">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7982">medicare beneficiary no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7982">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7983">medicare beneficiary number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7983">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7984">medicare beneficiary #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7984">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7985">멕시코 고유의 인구 레지스트리 코드(CURP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7985">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7986">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7987">영문자 18자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7987">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7988">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7988">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7989">4개의 문자(대소문자 미지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7989">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7990">유효한 날짜를 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7990">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7991">문자 - H/h 또는 M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7991">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7992">유효한 멕시코 상태 코드를 나타내는 두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7992">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7993">3개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7993">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7994">한 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7994">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-7995">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7995">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7996">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7996">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7997">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7997">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-7998">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7998">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-7999">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-7999">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8000">이  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8000">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8001">시작  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8001">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8002">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8002">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8003">이  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8003">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8004">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8004">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8008">고유 인구 레지스트리 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8008">Unique Population Registry Code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8009">고유 인구 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8009">unique population code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8010">CURP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8010">CURP</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8024">네덜란드 시민 서비스(BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8024">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8025">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8026">선택적 공백을 포함하는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8026">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8027">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8027">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8028">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8028">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8029">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8029">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8030">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8030">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8031">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8031">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8032">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8032">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8033">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8033">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8034">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8035">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8035">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8036">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8037">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8037">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8038">이 Func_netherlands_bsn 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8038">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8039">검색된 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8039">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8040">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8040">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8064">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8064">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8065">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8066">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8066">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8067">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8068">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8068">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8069">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8069">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8070">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8070">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8071">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8071">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8072">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8073">`Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8073">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8074">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8074">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8202">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8202">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8203">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8204">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8204">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8205">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8206">9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8206">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8207">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8208">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8208">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8209">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8210">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8210">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8211">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8211">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8212">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8212">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8213">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 검색합니다(예제 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8213">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8214">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8215">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8215">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8216">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8216">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8234">네덜란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8234">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8235">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8235">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8236">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8236">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8237">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8237">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8238">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8238">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8239">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8239">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8240">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8240">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8241">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8242">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8242">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8243">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8244">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8244">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8245">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8246">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8246">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8247">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8248">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8249">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8249">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8250">시작  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8250">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8251">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8251">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8252">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8252">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8290">네덜란드 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8290">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8291">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8291">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8292">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8292">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8293">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8293">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8294">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8294">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8295">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8295">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8296">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8296">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8297">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8297">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8298">영문자 14자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8298">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8299">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8299">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8300">14자 영문 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8300">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8301">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8301">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8302">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8302">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8303">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8303">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8304">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8304">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8305">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8305">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8306">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8306">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8307">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8307">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8308">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8309">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8309">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8310">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8311">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8311">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8312">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8312">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8313">검색된 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8313">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8314">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8314">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8315">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8315">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8316">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8316">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8317">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8317">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8318">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8318">vat number</span></span>
