- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8320">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8320">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8321">wearde tafoege tax getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8321">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8322">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8322">btw nûmer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8323">btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8323">btw-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8324">뉴질랜드 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8324">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8325">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8325">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8326">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8326">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8327">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8327">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8328">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8328">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8329">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8329">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8330">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8330">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8331">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8332">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8332">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8333">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8334">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8334">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8335">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8335">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8336">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8336">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8337">3-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8337">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8338">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8338">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8339">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8339">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8340">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8340">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8341">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8341">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8342">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8342">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8343">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8344">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8344">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8345">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8346">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8346">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8347">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8347">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8348">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8348">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8349">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8349">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8350">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8350">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8351">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8351">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8358">뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8358">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8359">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8359">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8360">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8360">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8361">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8361">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8362">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8362">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8363">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8363">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8364">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8364">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8365">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8366">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8366">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8367">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8367">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8368">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8368">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8369">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8369">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8370">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8370">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8371">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8372">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8372">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8373">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8374">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8374">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8375">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8375">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8376">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8376">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8377">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8377">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8378">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8378">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8445">뉴질랜드 내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8445">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8446">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8446">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8447">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8447">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8448">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8448">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8449">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8449">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8450">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8450">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8451">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8451">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8452">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8452">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8453">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8453">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8454">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8454">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8455">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8455">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8456">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8456">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8457">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8457">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8458">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8458">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8459">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8459">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8460">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8460">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8461">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8462">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8462">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8463">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8464">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8464">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8465">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8465">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8466">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8466">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8467">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8467">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8468">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8468">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8469">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8469">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8470">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8470">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8474">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8474">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8475">ird 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8475">ird number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8477">뉴질랜드 보건부 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8477">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8478">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8479">3개의 문자, 공백(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8479">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8480">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8480">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8481">'I' 및 'O'를 제외한 3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8481">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8482">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8482">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8483">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8483">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8484">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8485">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8486">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8487">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8488">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8488">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8489">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8489">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8490">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8491">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8492">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8492">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8493">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8493">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8507">뉴질랜드 사회 일지 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8507">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8508">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8508">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8509">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8509">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8510">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8510">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8511">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8511">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8512">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8512">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8513">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8513">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8514">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8515">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8515">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8516">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8517">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8517">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8518">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8518">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8519">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8519">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8520">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8520">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8521">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8521">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8522">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8522">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8523">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8524">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8525">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8526">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8526">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8527">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8527">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8528">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8528">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8529">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8530">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8530">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8531">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8531">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8532">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8532">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8538">노르웨이 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8538">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8539">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8540">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8540">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8541">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8542">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8542">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8543">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8543">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8544">3자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8544">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8545">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8545">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8546">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8547">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8547">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8548">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8549">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8549">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8550">이 Func_norway_id_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8550">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8551">검색된 Keyword_norway_id_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8551">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8552">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8552">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8553">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8553">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8554">이 Func_norway_id_numbe 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8554">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8555">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8556">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8556">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8557">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8557">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8558">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8558">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8559">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8559">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8560">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8560">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8561">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8561">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8562">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8562">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8563">Fødselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8563">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8564">필리핀 통합 다목적 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8564">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8565">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8566">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8566">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8567">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8568">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8568">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8569">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8569">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8570">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8570">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8571">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8571">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8572">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8572">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8573">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8573">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8574">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8574">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8575">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8575">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8576">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8576">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8577">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8577">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8578">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8578">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8579">검색된 Keyword_philippines_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8579">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8580">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8580">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8582">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8582">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8583">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8583">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8584">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8584">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8585">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8585">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8586">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8586">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8587">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8588">슬래시 2개가 포함된 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8588">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8589">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8590">14자리 숫자와 슬래시 2개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8590">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8591">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8591">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8592">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8592">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8593">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8594">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8594">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8595">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8595">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8596">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8597">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8597">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8598">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8599">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8599">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8600">`Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8600">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8601">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8601">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8725">폴란드 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8725">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8726">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8727">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8727">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8728">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8729">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8729">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8730">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8731">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8732">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8733">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8734">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8734">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8735">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8735">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8736">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8737">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8737">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8738">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8738">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8739">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8739">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8740">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8740">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8741">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8741">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8742">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8742">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8743">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8743">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8744">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8744">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-p142">dow. os.
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-p142">dow. os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8747">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8747">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8748">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8749">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8749">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8750">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8750">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8751">YYMMDD 형식의 생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8751">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8752">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8752">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8753">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8753">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8754">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8755">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8755">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8756">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8757">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8757">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8758">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8758">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8759">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8759">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8760">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8760">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8761">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8761">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8762">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8762">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8763">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8763">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8764">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8764">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8770">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8770">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8771">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8771">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8772">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8772">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8775">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8775">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8776">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8776">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8777">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8777">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8778">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8778">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8779">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8779">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8780">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8780">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8781">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8781">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8782">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8783">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8783">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8784">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8785">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8785">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8786">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8786">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8787">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8787">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8788">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8788">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8789">시작 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8789">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8790">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8790">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8791">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8791">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8792">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8792">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8793">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8793">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8794">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8795">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8795">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8796">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8822">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8822">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8823">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8824">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8825">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8826">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8827">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8828">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8829">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8830">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8830">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8831">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8832">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8832">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8833">9자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8833">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8834">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8834">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8835">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8835">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8836">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8836">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8837">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8838">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8839">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8840">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8840">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8841">이 Func_polish_regon_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8841">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8842">검색된 Keywords_polish_regon_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8842">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8843">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8843">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8844">이 Func_polish_regon_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8844">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8861">폴란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8861">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8862">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8862">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8863">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8863">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8864">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8864">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8865">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8865">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8866">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8866">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8867">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8867">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8868">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8869">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8869">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8870">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8871">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8871">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8872">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8873">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8873">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8874">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8875">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8876">이  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8876">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8877">시작  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8877">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8907">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8907">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8908">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8909">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8909">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8910">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8910">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8911">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8911">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8912">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8913">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8913">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8914">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8915">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8915">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8916">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8916">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8917">검색된 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8917">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8937">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8937">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8938">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8939">두 개의 패턴 - 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8939">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8940">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8941">패턴 1: 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5/6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8941">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8942">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8942">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8943">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8943">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8944">5 또는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8944">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8945">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8945">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8946">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8946">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8947">패턴 2: 문자 1개와 특수 문자가 있는 6/8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8947">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8948">1개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8948">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8949">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8949">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8950">6 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8950">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8951">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8951">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8952">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8952">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8953">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8953">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8954">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8954">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-8955">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8955">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-8956">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8956">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8957">`Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8957">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-8958">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-8958">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9090">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9090">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9091">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9092">공백이나 따로 6자리 숫자를 입력하고 공백이나 따로 문자를 1개씩 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9092">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9093">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9094">한 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9094">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9095">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9095">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9096">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9096">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9097">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9098">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9098">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9099">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9100">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9100">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9101">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9101">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9102">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9102">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9103">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9103">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9104">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9104">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9105">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9105">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9106">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9106">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9133">포르투갈 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9133">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9134">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9135">선택적 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9135">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9136">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9136">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9137">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9137">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9138">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9138">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9139">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9139">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9140">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9140">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9141">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9141">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9142">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9143">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9143">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9144">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9145">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9145">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9146">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9146">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9147">시작  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9147">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9148">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9148">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9149">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9149">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9174">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9174">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9175">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9176">문자 1개와 숫자 8자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9176">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9177">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9178">한 문자와 8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9178">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9179">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9179">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9180">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9180">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9181">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9182">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9183">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9184">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9184">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9185">`Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9185">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9186">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9314">루마니아 CNP(개인 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9314">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9315">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9315">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9316">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9316">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9317">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9317">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9318">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9318">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9319">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9319">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9320">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9320">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9321">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9322">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9322">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9323">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9323">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9324">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9324">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9325">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9325">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9326">01-52 또는 99일 수 있는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9326">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9327">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9327">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9328">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9329">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9329">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9330">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9331">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9331">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9332">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9332">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9333">시작  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9333">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9334">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9334">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9335">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9335">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
