## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9386">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9386">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9387">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9388">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9388">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9389">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9390">8자리 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9390">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9391">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9392">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9392">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9393">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9394">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9395">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9395">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9396">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9397">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YY(예제- 01 FEB/FEB 10) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9397">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9398">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9399">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9399">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9400">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9418">러시아 여권 번호 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9418">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9419">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9419">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9420">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9420">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9421">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9421">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9422">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9422">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9423">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9423">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9424">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9424">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9425">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9426">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9426">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9427">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9428">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9428">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9429">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9429">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9430">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9430">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9431">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9431">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9432">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9432">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9433">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9433">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9434">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9434">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9435">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9435">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9436">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9436">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9437">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9437">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9438">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9438">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9439">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9439">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9440">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9440">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9451">pусский номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9451">pусский номер паспорта</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9454">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9454">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9455">номерпаспорта #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9455">номерпаспорта#</span></span>


## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9456">러시아 여권 번호 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9456">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9457">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9457">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9458">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9458">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9459">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9459">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9460">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9460">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9461">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9461">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9462">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9462">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9463">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9463">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9464">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9464">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9465">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9465">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9466">9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9466">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9467">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9467">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9468">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9468">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9469">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9469">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9470">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9471">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9472">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9473">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9473">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9474">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9474">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9475">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9475">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9476">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9476">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_russia_passport_number_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9477">Keywords_russia_passport_number_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9477">Keywords_russia_passport_number_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9478">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9478">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9479">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9479">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9480">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9480">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9481">passport id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9481">passport id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9482">passportno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9482">passportno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9483">passportnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9483">passportnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9484">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9484">паспорт нет</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9485">паспорт id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9485">паспорт id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9487">pусский номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9487">pусский номер паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9492">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9492">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9493">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9494">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9494">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9495">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9496">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9496">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9497">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9498">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9498">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9499">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9500">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9501">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9501">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9502">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9502">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9503">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9503">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9504">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9504">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9505">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9505">Identification Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9507">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9507">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9508">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9508">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9509">싱가포르 NRIC(국가 등록 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9509">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9510">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9511">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9511">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9512">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9512">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9513">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9513">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9514">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9514">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9515">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9515">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9516">사전순 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9516">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9517">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9518">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9519">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9520">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9521">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9521">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9522">검색된 Keyword_singapore_nric 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9522">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9523">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9524">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9525">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9525">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9526">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9537">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9537">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9538">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9539">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9539">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9540">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9541">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9541">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9542">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9542">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9543">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9543">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9544">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9545">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9545">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9546">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9547">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9547">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9548">`Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9548">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9549">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9549">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9675">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9675">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9676">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9676">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9677">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9677">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9678">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9678">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9679">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9679">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9680">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9680">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9681">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9681">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9682">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9683">선택적 백 슬래시를 포함하는 9자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9683">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9684">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9684">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9685">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9685">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9686">선택적 슬래시(/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9686">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9687">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9687">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9688">선택적 검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9688">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9689">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9690">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9690">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9691">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9692">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9692">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9693">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9693">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9694">시작  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9694">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9695">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9695">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9696">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9696">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9743">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9743">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9744">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9745">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9745">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9746">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9747">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9747">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9748">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9749">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9750">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9751">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9752">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9752">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9753">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9754">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9755">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9756">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9756">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9757">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9779">스로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9779">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9780">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9781">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9781">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9783">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9783">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9784">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9785">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9785">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9786">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9787">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9787">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9788">`Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9788">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9789">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9789">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9916">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9916">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9917">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9917">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9918">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9918">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9919">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9919">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9920">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9920">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9921">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9921">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9922">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9922">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9923">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9923">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9924">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9924">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9925">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9925">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9926">지정된 패턴의 13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9926">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9927">"LLL"이 생년월일의 마지막 3자리에 해당하는 생년월일(DDMMLLL)에 해당하는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9927">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9928">생년월일 "50"에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9928">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9929">같은 날에 출생한 사람의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당하는 3자리 숫자(남성 000-499, 여성의 경우 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9929">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9930">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9930">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9931">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9932">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9932">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9933">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9934">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9934">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9935">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9935">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9936">시작  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9936">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9937">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9937">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9938">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9938">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9939">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9939">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9940">Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9940">Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9941">edinstvena številka glavnega državljana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9941">edinstvena številka glavnega državljana</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9966">솔로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9966">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9967">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9968">공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자를 입력할 때 공백이나 공백이 없는 문자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9968">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9969">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9970">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9970">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9971">문자 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9971">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9972">대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9972">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9973">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9973">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9974">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9975">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9975">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9976">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9977">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9977">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9978">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9978">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9979">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9979">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9980">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9980">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-9981">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9982">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9982">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-9983">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9983">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-9996">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-9996">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10006">솔로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10006">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10007">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10007">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10008">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10008">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10009">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10009">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10010">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10010">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10011">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10011">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10012">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10012">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10013">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10014">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10014">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10015">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10015">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10016">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10016">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10017">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10017">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10018">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10018">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10019">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10020">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10020">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10021">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10022">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10022">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10023">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10023">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10024">시작  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10024">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10025">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10025">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10026">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10026">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10027">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10027">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10037">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10037">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10038">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10038">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10039">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10039">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10040">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10040">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10041">에 대한 나타 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10041">taxid#</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10050">남아프리카 공화국 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10050">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10051">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10052">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10052">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10053">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10054">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10054">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10055">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10055">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10056">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10056">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10057">한 자리 숫자 시민권 표시기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10057">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10058">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10058">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10059">체크 um 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10059">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10060">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10061">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10062">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10063">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10063">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10064">이 Func_south_africa_identification_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10064">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10065">검색된 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10065">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10066">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10067">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10067">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10068">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10068">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10072">대한민국 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10072">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10073">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10074">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10074">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10075">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10076">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10076">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10077">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10077">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10078">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10078">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10079">세기 및 성별로 결정된 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10079">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10080">4자리 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10080">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10081">앞의 숫자가 동일한 사람들을 차별화하는 데 사용되는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10081">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10082">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10082">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10083">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10084">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10084">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10085">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10086">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10087">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10087">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10088">검색된 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10088">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10089">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10089">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10090">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10090">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10091">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10091">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10092">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10092">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10100">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10100">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10101">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10102">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10102">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10103">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10104">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10104">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10105">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10105">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10106">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10106">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10107">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10108">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10108">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10109">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10110">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10111">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10111">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10112">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10113">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10113">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10114">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10114">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10248">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10248">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10249">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10249">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10250">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10250">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10251">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10251">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10252">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10252">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10253">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10253">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10254">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10254">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10255">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10256">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10256">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10257">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10258">7자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10258">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10259">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10259">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10260">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10260">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10261">검사 문자 1개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10261">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10262">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10263">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10263">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10264">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10265">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10265">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10266">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10266">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10267">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10267">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10268">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10268">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10269">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10269">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10293">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10293">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10294">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10294">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10295">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 문자와 숫자의 8자 또는 9자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10295">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10296">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10297">8자 또는 9자 조합의 문자와 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10297">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10298">2자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10298">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10299">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10299">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10300">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10300">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10301">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10302">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10302">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10303">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10304">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10305">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10305">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10306">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10306">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10307">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD-MM-YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10307">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10308">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10308">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10309">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10309">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10310">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10310">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10339">스페인 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10339">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10340">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10340">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10341">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10341">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10342">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10342">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10343">11-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10343">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10344">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10344">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10345">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10345">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10346">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10346">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10347">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10347">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10348">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10348">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10349">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10350">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10350">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10351">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10352">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10352">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10353">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10353">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10354">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10354">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10355">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10355">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10356">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10356">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10357">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10357">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10358">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10358">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10359">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10359">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10360">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10360">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10361">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10361">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10362">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10362">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10363">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10363">socialsecurityno</span></span>
