- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10365">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10365">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10366">número de la seguridad social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10366">número de la seguridad social</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10367">스페인 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10367">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10368">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10368">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10369">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10369">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10370">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10370">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10371">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10371">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10372">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10372">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10373">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10373">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10374">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10375">지정된 패턴에서 7-8자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10375">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10376">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10376">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10377">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 있는 스페인어 자연인:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10377">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10378">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10378">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10379">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10379">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10380">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 비 거주자 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10380">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10381">대문자 1자 "L"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10381">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10382">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10382">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10383">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10383">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10384">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 14세 미만의 거주자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10384">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10385">대문자 1자 "K"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10385">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10386">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10386">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10387">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10387">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10388">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10388">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10389">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z"(대소문자 구분)의 대문자 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10389">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10390">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10390">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10391">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10391">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10392">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10392">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10393">"M"을(를) 구분하는 대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10393">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10394">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10394">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10395">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10395">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10396">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10397">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10397">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10398">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10399">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10400">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10400">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10401">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10401">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10402">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10402">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10403">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10403">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10434">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10434">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10435">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10436">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10436">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10437">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10437">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10438">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10438">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10439">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10439">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10440">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd"에서 "pwd"는 소문자 앞에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10440">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10441">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10441">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10442">달러 기호($), 백분율 기호(%), 기호(>), 기호(@), 인용 부호("), 세미코론(;), 왼쪽 중괄호([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호({)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10442">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10443">세미코론(;), 슬래시(/) 또는 인용 부호(")가 아닌 7-128자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10443">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10444">세미코론(;) 또는 인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10444">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10445">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10446">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10446">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10447">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10448">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10448">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10449">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10449">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10450">검색된 CEP_GlobalFilter 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10450">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10451">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10451">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10452">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10452">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10453">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10453">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10454">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10454">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10455">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10455">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10456">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10456">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10457">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10457">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10458">sample</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10458">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10459">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10459">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10460">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10460">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10461">암호 또는 pwd 다음에 0-2 공백, 등호(=), 0-2 공백 및 추가 표시(\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10461">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10462">암호 또는 pwd 다음을 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10462">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10463">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10463">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10464">기호(<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10464">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10465">대/소문자, 숫자, 추가 문자(\*), 하이픈(-), 밑 줄(_) 또는 공백 문자에 대한 1-200자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10465">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10466">기호보다 크다(>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10466">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10480">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10480">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10481">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10482">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10482">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10483">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10484">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10484">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10485">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10485">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10486">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10486">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10487">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10487">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10488">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10489">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10489">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10490">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10491">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10492">`Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10492">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10493">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10493">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10626">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10626">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10627">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10628">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10628">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10629">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10630">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10630">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10631">두 자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10631">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10632">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10632">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10633">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10633">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10634">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10634">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10635">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10636">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10636">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10637">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10638">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10638">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10639">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10639">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10640">키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10640">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10641">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10641">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10642">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10642">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10643">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10643">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10644">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10644">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10663">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10663">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10664">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10665">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10665">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10666">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10667">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10667">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10668">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10669">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10670">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10671">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10671">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10672">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10672">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10673">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10673">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10674">`Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(01 JAN/JAN 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10674">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10675">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10676">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10676">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10677">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10677">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10678">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10678">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10713">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10713">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10714">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10714">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10715">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10715">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10716">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10716">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10717">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10717">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10718">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10718">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10719">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10719">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10720">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10721">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10721">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10722">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10723">10자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10723">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10724">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10724">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10725">더하기 기호 또는 마이너스 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10725">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10726">ID 번호를 고유하게 만드는 세 자리 숫자입니다. 여기서:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10726">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10727">1990년 전에 발급된 숫자의 경우 7번째와 8번째 숫자는 생년월일 또는 외계인을 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10727">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10728">9번째 위치의 숫자는 성별을 남성에 대해 홀수로 나타내거나 여성의 경우 조차도 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10728">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10729">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10729">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10730">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10731">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10731">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10732">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10733">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10733">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10734">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10734">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10735">시작  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10735">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10736">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10736">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10737">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10737">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10763">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10763">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10764">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10765">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10765">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10766">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10767">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10767">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10768">4문자 은행 코드(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10768">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10769">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10769">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10770">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10770">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10771">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10771">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10772">1~3자리 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10772">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10773">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10774">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10775">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10776">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10777">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10777">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10778">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10778">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10779">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10779">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10788">swift code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10788">swift code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10789">swift number #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10789">swift number #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10790">swift routing number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10790">swift routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10791">bic number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10791">bic number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10792">bic code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10792">bic code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10793">bic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10793">bic #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10794">bic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10794">bic#</span></span>

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10815">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10815">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10816">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10816">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10817">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10817">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10818">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10818">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10819">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10819">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10820">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10820">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10821">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10821">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10822">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10822">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10823">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10823">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10824">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10824">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10825">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10825">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10826">3자리 숫자 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10826">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10827">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10827">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10828">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10828">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10829">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10829">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10830">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10830">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10831">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10831">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10832">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10832">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10833">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10833">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10834">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10834">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10835">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10835">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10836">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10836">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10837">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10837">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10838">검색된 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10838">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10839">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10839">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10840">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10840">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10861">대만 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10861">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10862">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10863">1개의 문자(영어) 및 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10863">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10864">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10865">한 문자(영어) 다음에 9자리 숫자를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10865">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10866">한 글자(영어로, 대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10866">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10867">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10867">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10868">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10868">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10869">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10870">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10870">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10871">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10872">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10872">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10873">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10873">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10874">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10874">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10875">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10875">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10876">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10876">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10877">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10877">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10878">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10878">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10884">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10884">身份證號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10887">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10887">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10888">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10888">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10889">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10889">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10890">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10890">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10891">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10891">簽名</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10893">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10893">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10894">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10894">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10895">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10895">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10896">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10896">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10897">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10897">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10898">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10898">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10899">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10899">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10900">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10900">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10901">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10901">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10902">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10902">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10903">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10903">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10904">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10904">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10905">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10906">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10906">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10907">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10908">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10908">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10909">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10909">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10910">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_passport 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10910">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10911">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10911">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10912">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10912">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10913">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10913">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10914">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10914">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10915">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10915">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10916">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10916">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10917">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10917">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10918">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10918">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10919">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10919">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10920">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10920">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10921">대만 거주 인증서(ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10921">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10922">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10923">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10923">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10924">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10925">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10925">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10926">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10926">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10927">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10927">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10928">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10928">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10929">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10929">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10930">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10930">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10931">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10931">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10932">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10932">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10933">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10933">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10934">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10934">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10935">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10935">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10936">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10936">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10937">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10937">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10938">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10938">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10939">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10939">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10940">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10940">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10941">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10941">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10942">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10942">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10943">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10943">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10944">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10944">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10945">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10945">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10946">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10946">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10947">태국어 인구 ID 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10947">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10948">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10949">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10949">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10950">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10951">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10951">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10952">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아닌 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10952">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10953">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10953">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10954">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10955">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10955">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10956">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10957">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10957">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10958">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10958">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10959">검색된 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10959">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10960">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10961">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10961">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10962">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10962">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10963">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10963">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10964">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10964">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10965">Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10965">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10966">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10966">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10967">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10967">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10968">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10968">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10969">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10969">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10970">터키어 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10970">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10971">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10972">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10972">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10973">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10974">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10974">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10975">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10976">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10976">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10977">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10978">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10979">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10979">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10980">검색된 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10980">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10981">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10982">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10982">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10983">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10983">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10984">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10984">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10985">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10985">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10986">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10986">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10987">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10987">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10988">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10988">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10989">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10989">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10990">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10990">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10991">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10991">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10992">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10992">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-10993">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10993">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-10994">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10994">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10995">5개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10995">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10996">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10996">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10997">생년월일의 날짜 형식 MMDDY의 5자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10997">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10998">드라이버가 여성인 경우 일곱 번째 문자가 50으로 증가합니다. 시험의 경우 01에서 12까지가 아니라 51에서 62까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10998">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-10999">대소문자 2개(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-10999">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11000">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11000">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11001">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11002">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11002">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11003">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11004">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11005">이 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11005">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11006">시작 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11006">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11007">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11007">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11008">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11008">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11009">이 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11009">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11010">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11010">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11131">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11131">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11132">선택 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11132">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11133">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11133">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11134">2개의 문자와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11134">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11135">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11135">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11136">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 1-4개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11136">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11137">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11138">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11139">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11140">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11140">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11141">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11141">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11142">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11142">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11143">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11143">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11144">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11144">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11145">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11145">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11146">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11146">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11147">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11147">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11148">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11148">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11149">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11149">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11150">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11150">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11151">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11152">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11152">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11153">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11154">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11154">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11155">3자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11155">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11156">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11156">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11157">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11157">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11158">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11158">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11159">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11159">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11160">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11161">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11161">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11162">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11163">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11163">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11164">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11164">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11165">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11165">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11166">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11166">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11167">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11167">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11168">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11168">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11169">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11171">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11171">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11181">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11181">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11183">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11183">DOB</span></span>
