## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11187">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11187">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11188">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11188">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11189">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11189">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11190">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11190">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11191">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11192">공백 또는 대시로 구분된 7자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11192">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11193">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11194">가능한 두 가지 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11194">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11195">두 문자(유효한 NINOS는 이 연결의 유효성을 검사하는 특정 문자만 사용하고 대소문자는 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11195">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11196">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11196">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11197">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D' 중 하나(접두사와 같이 접미사에는 특정 문자만 사용할 수 있습니다. 대소문자 구분 안 ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11197">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11198">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11198">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11199">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11199">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11200">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11200">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11201">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11201">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11202">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11202">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11203">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11203">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11204">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11204">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11205">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11205">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11206">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11206">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11207">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11207">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11208">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11209">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11209">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11210">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11211">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11211">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11212">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11212">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11213">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11213">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11214">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11215">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11215">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11216">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11216">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11217">Keyword_uk_nino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11217">Keyword_uk_nino</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11218">national insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11218">national insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11219">national insurance contributions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11219">national insurance contributions</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11220">protection act</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11220">protection act</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11221">insurance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11221">insurance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11222">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11222">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11223">insurance application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11223">insurance application</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11224">medical application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11224">medical application</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11225">social insurance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11225">social insurance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11226">medical attention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11226">medical attention</span></span>

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11237">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11237">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11238">고유 납세자 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11238">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11239">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11239">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11240">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11240">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11241">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11241">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11242">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11242">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11243">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11243">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11244">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11244">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11245">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11246">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11246">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11247">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11248">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11248">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11249">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11249">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11250">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11250">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11251">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11251">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11252">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11252">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11253">이  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11253">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11254">시작  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11254">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11255">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11255">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11260">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11260">tax identification no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11266">일자 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11266">taxidno#</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11274">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11274">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11275">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11276">6-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11276">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11277">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11278">6-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11278">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11279">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11280">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11280">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11281">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11282">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11282">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11283">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11283">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11284">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11284">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11314">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11314">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11315">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11315">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11316">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11316">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11317">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11317">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11318">주에 따라 다를 수 있습니다. 예: 뉴욕:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11318">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11319">ddd ddd ddd와 같은 9자리 숫자가 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11319">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11320">dddddd와 같은 9자리 숫자는 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11320">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11321">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11321">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11322">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11322">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11323">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11323">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11324">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11324">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11325">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11325">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11326">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11326">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11327">검색된 Keyword_us_drivers_license 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11327">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11328">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11328">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11329">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11329">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11330">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11330">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11331">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11331">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11332">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11332">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11430">미국 ITIN(개인 납세자 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11430">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11431">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11432">"9"로 시작하고 "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함하는 9자리 숫자이며 선택적으로 공백 또는 대시로 서식이 지정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11432">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11433">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11434">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11434">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11435">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11435">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11436">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11436">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11437">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11437">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11438">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11438">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11439">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11439">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11440">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11440">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11441">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11441">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11442">unformatted:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11442">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11443">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11443">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11444">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11444">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11445">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11445">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11446">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11446">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11447">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11448">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11448">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11449">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11450">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11450">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11451">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11451">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11452">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11452">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11453">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11453">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11454">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11454">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11455">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11455">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11456">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11456">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11457">이 Func_formatted_itin Func_unformatted_itin 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11457">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11472">미국 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11472">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11473">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11474">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11474">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11475">2011년 중반 전에 발급된 SSN의 서식은 강력합니다. 이 서식은 숫자의 특정 부분이 특정 범위 내에 있어야 합니다(체크 UM은 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11475">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11476">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11476">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11477">네 가지 함수는 네 가지 다른 패턴에서 SSNS를 찾아보세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11477">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11478">Func_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정되어 있는 2011년보다 강력한 서식이 있는 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11478">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로 서식이 지정되지 않은 강력한 2011 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 공백(ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd d)으로 서식이 지정된 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로폼이 없는 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11482">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11483">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11483">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11484">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11485">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11485">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11486">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11486">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11487">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11487">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11488">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11488">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11489">이 Func_unformatted_ssn 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11489">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11490">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11490">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11491">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11491">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11492">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11492">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11493">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11493">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11494">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11494">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11495">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11495">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11496">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11496">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11497">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11497">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11499">SSA 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11499">SSA Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11502">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11502">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11503">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11503">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11504">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11504">Social Security#</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11511">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11511">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11512">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11512">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11513">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11514">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11514">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11515">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11516">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11516">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11517">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11518">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11518">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11519">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11520">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11521">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11521">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11522">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11522">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11523">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11523">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11524">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11525">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11525">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11526">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11526">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11527">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11527">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11528">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11528">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11542">우크라이나 여권 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11542">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11543">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11543">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11544">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11544">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11545">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11545">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11546">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11546">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11547">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11547">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11548">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11548">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11549">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11550">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11550">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11551">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11552">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11552">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11553">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11554">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11554">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11555">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11556">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11556">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11557">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11557">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11558">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11558">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11561">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11561">ukraine passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11565">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11565">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11566">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11566">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11567">우크라이나 여권 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11567">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11568">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11568">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11569">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11569">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11570">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11570">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11571">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11571">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11572">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11572">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11573">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11573">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11574">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11574">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11575">8자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11575">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11576">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11576">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11577">8자 영문 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11577">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11578">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11578">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11579">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11579">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11580">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11580">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11581">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11581">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c079-11582">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c079-11583">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11583">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11584">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11584">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2c079-11585">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c079-11585">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
